h3_title: Kang-Jin Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Using the Pillar Stance is a great bet for this fight since you'll have both increased height and range on your strikes even if your lock-on isn't on the exact right spot that might cause your Thrust Stance to miss. Hit them hard enough with a few Focus Points banked, and you can often send her staggering to the ground.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Kang-Jin_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Kang-Jin Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Kang-Jin Loong' and the sub-subsection 'Kang-Jin Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Using the Pillar Stance is a great bet for this fight since you'll have both increased height and range on your strikes even if your lock-on isn't on the exact right spot that might cause your Thrust Stance to miss. Hit them hard enough with a few Focus Points banked, and you can often send her staggering to the ground.
